fe9efe99d8f3dd4ab066fc66738bd837.short_bio: Matt Anderson is an intern for the Deseret News.
fe9efe99d8f3dd4ab066fc66738bd837.full_bio: Matt Anderson is a web news intern for the Deseret News. He attended Southern Virginia University where he worked for Southern Virginia’s communications department. A native of Salt Lake City, Matt enjoys telling stories, whether it be visually or in writing.
